last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mayor Bae's niece devises a foolproof political scheme for her uncle. Je-mun vows to get revenge -- for his comrades, and for all the people of Seowon.

name: Bad Guys: Vile City
overview: Ordered to take down a villainous business leader who controls the city, a prosecutor gathers a team of men who may not be so clean themselves.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Harboring a traumatic experience that led him to avoid crime scenes, prosecutor Noh Jin-pyeong begins his first day of work in the city of Seowon.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: While tracking down their immediate suspect, Je-mun's men find an unexpected link between Jo Yeong-guk, their ultimate target, and the city's mayor.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: To find proof that Jo Yeong-guk committed bribery, Je-mun hatches out a plan that'll make it easier to locate where his dirty money is stored.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Jin-pyeong, who's full of doubts after a secret meeting with deputy chief prosecutor Ban Jun-hyeok, is tasked with interrogating a key witness.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Despite the chief prosecutor's instructions, Je-mun orders a stop to the search and seizure, and tries to pursue a new route to catch the bad guys.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: When his team suffers casualties, Je-mun no longer has room for mercy and calls for Jo Yeong-guk's arrest -- no matter what it may cost.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The day of the final hearing arrives, and Je-mun prepares to conclude Jo Yeong-guk's case, but an even worse enemy threatens to thwart his plan.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Hoping to find answers regarding his late colleague's case, Jin-pyeong accepts Ban Jun-hyeok's offer and joins a special investigations team.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: To pay his sister's hospital bills, Gang-ju has no choice but to get help from a loan shark, who offers to cancel the debt in exchange for a "service."

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Heo Il-hu searches for the missing high school girl. Je-mun secretly investigates the cases that Special Team Three supposedly solved already.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Soon after Lee Myeong-deuk warns him to disband Special Team Three, Ban Jun-hyeok receives news that there's a problem within the team.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Je-mun and his reunited team of men find out that the evidence regarding the Inbuk teen murder case may have been fabricated.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Detective Hwang from Special Team Three is in crunch time to catch the wanted men. Likewise, Je-mun's men prepare to take on their adversaries.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Not happy with how things turned out for Jo Yeong-guk, Je-mun tries to get Ha Sang-mo's testimony himself, but a shocking truth awaits.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Je-mun quickly closes in on Jo Yeong-guk. Meanwhile, Mayor Bae Sang-do's sister plans to do whatever she can to get her brother re-elected.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Mayor Bae's niece devises a foolproof political scheme for her uncle. Je-mun vows to get revenge -- for his comrades, and for all the people of Seowon.
